entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is lying among Aunt Petunia's begonias and feeling frustrated and hopeless.

entities.name: Aunt Petunia
entities.description: Harry's aunt, whose dying begonias Harry is lying among.

entities.name: the world
entities.description: The world that Harry feels he belongs to, implying a sense of belonging and connection.

relationships.description: Harry is lying among Aunt Petunia's dying begonias.
